lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: My life has been very blessed and remains so. I loan to give back to those who desire to empower themselves, yet lack the means to do so. To assist my fellow brothers and sisters on this Earth who are in need. For in reality, we are all one big family. The Divine has blessed me and so I desire to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work as a waiter in a restaurant in the town where I live. I also have an eBay store where I sell items for others. I also am creating my own organic garden so I can grow my own healthy food. I am also a healer assisting others with the training I have been given. I am also a student who loves to learn new subjects of interest. I also enjoy working with my hands, by tapping into my creativity, and use this to create beauty, not only around my home, but in the world. I am an inventor. I am a deeply Spiritual individual and believe we are all connected as one family on this Earth. I respect all cultures and indigenous people - knowing they have a tremendous amount of knowledge and wisdom that can benefit mankind. I love Mother Nature and feel a deep connection to her and seek, in my own way, to heal our environment.  I now am looking for ways to give back to others in need to help and assist them, for my life has been very blessed compared with millions of my fellow brothers and sisters.

lenders.name: Nina

lenders.name: Moore Gourmet for Good
lenders.occupational_info:
Moore Gourmet for Good (MGG) is a premier non-profit gift basket retailer. MGG is concentrating on making gourmet gift baskets out of a wide range of high-quality ingredients. All profits will go to Kiva, an online microfinance institution. Kiva is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization, incorporated in November 2005; therefore MGG gift baskets will be tax-deductible.

 In addition to having several flagship baskets, MGG will also offer the option of a custom basket allowing the customer to choose the ingredients themselves. MGG will be selling to individuals as well as corporations. Initially the bulk of MGG's business will be generated by individuals from word-of-mouth referrals, but as time passes, corporations will become a growing percentage of sales.

lenders.loan_because: To inspire poeple and myself
lenders.occupational_info: creating things my boss & I like (and think would work) with computer, pen, pencil, paper, tools & my hands.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: It makes me fell good.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell the American dream!!!!!

lenders.name: Rus
lenders.loan_because: Kiva allows me to give someone a hand-up not a hand-out.
lenders.occupational_info: I facilitate distribution of food and hygiene items to low-income families free of charge.

lenders.name: Abdul Kadir
lenders.occupational_info: my road to success is always underconstruction and can only be perfected with my hard work, loyalty , trust and most of all the blessings of the almighty.AMEEN.

lenders.name: cchrissyy
lenders.occupational_info: I own a store for baby products.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: Microlending is an awesome way to reach out to others and is a perpetual way of giving. I love that the money can be reloaned and continue to benefit people indefinitely.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and maintain websites. I am also a photographer and graphic designer.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because:
I've worked hard for 40 years and I'm still working.  I want to help other
hardworking women make a better life for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I take down questions and answers in shorthand and type it up in a booklet for the legal profession.

lenders.name: Lupita
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone deserves the opportunity to make a better life for themselves through hard work. Sometimes we all need just a little help now and then to get a good start. I lived in Mexico for a while and have never met people who have worked as hard as most of them do, but still had so little to show for it. I'd love to help, even if it's in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children who are 9 and 10 years old. I have 28 children in my class, some who are learning english.

lenders.name: mar
lenders.loan_because: i want to join GDI as of now i have no credit card
lenders.occupational_info: i am experienced web designer and graphic artist

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with clinical information systems.

lenders.name: Chen
lenders.loan_because: loan changes lives

lenders.name: Christoffer
lenders.loan_because: During my study I heard a lot about micro-financing and always thought that it is a good way to help because in my opinion people don't want big donates or people to say them what they should do but find their own way to solve their problems and microfinancing enables them to find their way. So I'm really happy to find a way to participate.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working in a consultancy for companies in the energy business. We advice companies to find their strategy for example entering the market for renewable energy sources or how to cooperate with other companies.

lenders.name: Rea
lenders.loan_because: I believe small things like this can bring a true change and simply because I can give a loan to somebody.

lenders.name: Simon Moger
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to start something of their own.  When I set up my business with my business partner, we need to find capital as all the banks were saying "no" and thanks to a couple of people investing in our business, we were able to get things up and running.  I am pleased to be able to give something back and help these entrepreneurs start up their own businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: My business partner and I own a new company that produces both "own label" and our own brands of drinks in India and the Middle East.

lenders.name: Rudy
lenders.loan_because:
Probabilmente con poco si può aiutare molto qualcuno.
Un'etica secolare è possibile.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to assist in peoples lives that deserve a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: We save businesses when they face unforeseen disruptions.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: Proverty is all around the world where we cannot see or feel until we witness ourselves. If there is chance for me to lend a hand to the people in need of survival. I would not hesitate to do so.
